description: FSS files are named with an index plus the ".fss" extension. For example, a split archive for video.wmv would have the filenames video.wmv_1.fss , video.wmv_2.fss , etc. Additionally, the split archive would have a master file called video.wmv_0.fsm .
NOTE: Splitty can split files by a maximum file size or by a target number of output files.
